item.title: Aspose.Slides for Python 22.12 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Slides for Python via .NET 22.12 Key Summary Category Related Documentation SLIDESPYNET-68 Use Aspose.Slides for Net 22.12 features Enhancement

item.title: Aspose.Slides for Python 22.11 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Slides for Python via .NET 22.11 Key Summary Category Related Documentation SLIDESPYNET-65 Use Aspose.Slides for Net 22.11 features Enhancement Public API Changes PDF 1.7 and PDF 1.6 export support added We implemented support for PDF export to formats 1.6 and 1.7: PdfCompliance.PDF16 PdfCompliance.PDF17 This Python code demonstrates an export to PDF 1.

item.title: Aspose.Slides for Python 22.10 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Slides for Python via .NET 22.10 Key Summary Category Related Documentation SLIDESPYNET-52 Use Aspose.Slides for Net 22.10 features Enhancement SLIDESPYNET-50 Import error on Mac arm64 using python-intel64 Bug Public API Changes ISVGOptions.use_frame_size and ISVGOptions.use_frame_rotation have been added New properties use_frame_size and use_frame_rotation have been added to the ISVGOptions interface and SVGOptions class.

item.title: Aspose.Slides for Python 22.9 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Slides for Python via .NET 22.9 Key Summary Category Related Documentation SLIDESPYNET-43 Use Aspose.Slides for Net 22.9 features Enhancement SLIDESPYNET-1 Prepare Aspose.Slides for Python via .NET for macOS Feature Public API Changes Added support for macOS We are pleased to announce the launch of Aspose.Slides for Python via .

item.title: Aspose.Slides for Python 22.8 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Slides for Python via .NET 22.8 Key Summary Category Related Documentation SLIDESPYNET-34 Use Aspose.Slides for Net 22.8 features Enhancement Public API Changes Presentation Slide Show Setup Settings support We implemented support for Presentation Slide Show Settings. These are the relevant classes and properties: Presentation.slide_show_settings property - allows you to specify the slide show settings for a presentation.

item.title: Aspose.Slides for Python 22.6 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Slides for Python via .NET 22.6 Key Summary Category Related Documentation SLIDESPYNET-12 Use Aspose.Slides for Net 22.6 features Enhancement Obsolete PresentationLockingBehavior LoadAndRelease_Legacy_TemporaryDefault was removed The obsolete PresentationLockingBehavior LOAD_AND_RELEASE_LEGACY_TEMPORARY_DEFAULT enum member was removed. LOAD_AND_RELEASE is a default presentation locking behavior now.

item.title: Aspose.Slides for Python 22.4 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Slides for Python via .NET 22.4 Key Summary Category Related Documentation SLIDESPYNET-5 Use Aspose.Slides for Net 22.4 features Enhancement Public API Changes LowCode Compress - remove unused layout and master slides added A new LowCode Compress methods were added: void RemoveUnusedMasterSlides(Presentation pres) void RemoveUnusedLayoutSlides(Presentation pres) Remove unused master slides from Presentation import aspose.

item.title: Aspose.Slides for Python 22.1 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Slides for Python via .NET 22.1 Key Summary Category Related Documentation SLIDESPYNET-3 Use Aspose.Slides for Net 22.1 features Enhancement Public API Changes NONE member have been added to TimeUnitType enumeration A new NONE member have been added to TimeUnitType enumeration. This member indicates that no unit should be set for the appropriate unit scale.
